participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Active and health-conscious, enjoys fitness activities and takes care of her physical well-being.
participant_1.background: I have two dogs and enjoy going to the gym regularly. I like using the treadmill and rowing machine. Eating is something I do when I'm bored, and I have long hair.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Caring and community-oriented, with a strong background in sports and education.
participant_2.background: I grew up in a poor family and am now a retired gym teacher. I volunteer at a soup kitchen and enjoy watching war documentaries, with cheeseburgers being my favorite food.
